events.message: The customer reported a vehicle collision that occurred on the morning of April 30th, requesting to initiate a claim for the damages sustained.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords indicating a car collision and damage to the vehicle.
An agent was assigned to manage the investigation and claims process for the reported automobile accident involving the insured vehicle.
Acknowledged receipt of the claim and reassured the customer that their accident report is being processed promptly and efficiently.
Requested additional documents including the police report, photographs of the car damage, and witness statements to support the claim investigation.
Received all requested documents from the claimant, including detailed images of the vehicle damage and the official police collision report.
Initiated investigation to verify the circumstances surrounding the car accident and assess the extent of damage to determine liability.
Completed a thorough investigation confirming the insured party was not at fault for the collision, with clear evidence submitted.
Proposed a settlement amount covering full repair costs of the vehicle as determined by the assessment following investigation.
Received positive feedback from the customer expressing satisfaction with the timely processing and clear communication.
Officially approved the claim allowing payment to proceed for vehicle repairs as per the agreed settlement.
Issued payment to the repair shop directly as part of the settlement agreement for the vehicle accident claim.
Closed the claim after confirming the customer was satisfied with the repair services and payment has been completed.
Archived all case documents and notes related to the auto accident claim for future reference and record-keeping compliance.
